mutation(
	$accountId: Int!,
	$rule: AlertsMutingRuleInput!,
) { AlertsMutingRuleCreate(
	accountId: $accountId,
	rule: $rule,
) {
	accountId
	condition {
		conditions {
			attribute
			operator
			values
		}
		operator
	}
	createdAt
	createdBy
	createdByUser {
		email
		gravatar
		id
		name
	}
	description
	enabled
	id
	name
	schedule {
		endTime
		startTime
		timeZone
	}
	status
	updatedAt
	updatedBy
	updatedByUser {
		email
		gravatar
		id
		name
	}
} }
